description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The world of Kaleidoscope has been shrouded in darkness! All that was once lush and colorful is now dreary and colorless. Take on the role of Tint, an unusual inhabitant of Kaleidoscope, and traverse the surreal environments in search of the lost colors!
description.short: The world of Kaleidoscope has been shrouded in darkness! All that was once lush and colorful is now dreary and colorless. Take on the role of Tint, an unusual inhabitant of Kaleidoscope, and traverse the surreal environments in search of the lost colors!
